title: No Mountain Bike Bid in Paris: Mathieu van der Poel Commits to Road Race for Olympic Games
content:
Van der Poel puts Olympic mountain bike dreams on hold and hints at possible 2028 bid. The Tour de France and the Olympic road race are up next.

Read the full article at No Mountain Bike Bid in Paris: Mathieu van der Poel Commits to Road Race for Olympic Games on Velo.
